content.heading: HTML Iframes
paragraphs: An HTML iframe is used to display a web page within a web page.

content.heading: HTML Iframe Syntax
paragraphs: The HTML <iframe> tag specifies an inline frame used to embed another document within the current HTML document.

content.heading: Iframe - Set Height and Width
paragraphs: Use the height and width attributes to specify the size of the iframe. The height and width are specified in pixels by default.

content.heading: Iframe - Remove the Border
paragraphs: By default, an iframe has a border around it. To remove the border, add the style attribute and use the CSS border property.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<iframe src="demo_iframe.htm"
 style="border:2px solid red;" 
title="Iframe Example">
</iframe>

content.heading: Iframe - Target for a Link
paragraphs: An iframe can be used as the target frame for a link. The target attribute of the link must refer to the name attribute of the iframe.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs: bitlogicx.com
